response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price, which I believe will not only be attractive but also reflect the true value of the item. My proposed price for you is $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from the transaction while respecting the intrinsic value of the product.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require any further information. I am looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this business with you.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
